===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|匸|矢|t1=bag, container|t2=arrow|ls=ic}} – an arrow (矢) in a chest, indicating one of the early practices of doctors which was to pull the arrows out of wounded soldiers’ chests.

Also {{Han simp|醫|f=殳|t=&nbsp;|f2=酉|t2=&nbsp;}}. Compare [[声]] from [[聲]].
